#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int getbits(int temp){
	
	int n =0;
	
	while(temp){
		if(temp%2!=0)
		n++;
		
		temp/=2;
	}
	
	return n;
}

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	
	while(n--){	
	int cnt=0;
		
	int a,b;
	cin>>a>>b;
	
	if(a!=b){
		cnt = getbits((a^b));
	}
	
	cout<<cnt<<endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
